statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, inventory_level FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A' AND inventory_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%Apple%';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name FROM SupplierInventory ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory WHERE inventory_level > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, inventory_level FROM SupplierInventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, inventory_level FROM SupplierInventory ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM SupplierInventory GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING total_products > 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 3;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.supplier_id = inventory.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, supplier_email;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY supplier_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_email FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact, supplier_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50 ORDER BY product_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_products DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, last_restock_date FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.supplier_name, p.product_name, i.quantity, i.last_restock_date FROM Suppliers s JOIN Products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id ORDER BY s.supplier_name, p.product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT restock_id, restock_date, restock_quantity FROM restock_history WHERE restock_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY restock_date ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, quantity, last_stock_date FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_stock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_id FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT order_date, quantity_ordered FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100) ORDER BY supplier_name;

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, products.product_name, inventory.stock_quantity FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.stock_quantity < inventory.reorder_threshold;

SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, quantity_ordered FROM shipments JOIN orders ON shipments.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
